original_text: Ephron the Hittite was sitting among his people and he replied to Abraham in the hearing of all the Hittites who had come to the gate of his city.
korean_text: 에브론이 헷 족속 중에 앉아 있더니 그가 헷 족속 곧 성문에 들어온 모든 자가 듣는 데서 아브라함에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Ephron the Hittite was sitting among his people
sentences.korean_translation: 헷 족속 에브론이 그 백성 중에 앉아 있었는데

sentences.original_text: in the hearing of all the Hittites
who had come to the gate of his city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 성읍 문에 온 헷 족속들이 들었더라
